definition: Buddhist nun/(often used in phonetic spellings)

sentences.english: I could literally count the patches on the ripstop nylon.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至能夠精確地數清防刮尼龍傘上的補丁。

sentences.english: There may even be some wire or nylon biting into the flesh.
sentences.chinese: 甚至可能有一些金屬絲或者尼龍線勒到肉裏。

sentences.english: He straightened his back, his fingers freeing nylon line from a speedily revolving reel.
sentences.chinese: 他直起腰身，用手指快速地從繞線輪上放出尼龍線。

sentences.english: They were sutured with 100 Nylon lines.
Nylon is nearly twice as strong as natural silk.
sentences.chinese: 尼龍的強度幾乎是天然絲的兩倍。

sentences.english: The mechanical and heat properties of glass microspheres filling nylon 6 were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了玻璃微珠填充改性尼龍6的力學性能和熱性能。

sentences.english: Close the velcro closure and you have the softest pet ever.
sentences.chinese: 關閉維可牢尼龍搭扣，你有最柔軟的寵物永遠。

sentences.english: Outer material is made from Tumi's signature ballistic nylon.
sentences.chinese: 荼靡的簽名彈道尼龍材料是由外。

sentences.english: High quality nylon abrasive cleaning brush set, save cost wearing parts.
sentences.chinese: 高品質尼龍耐磨洗地刷盤，節省易損件成本。

sentences.english: There’s even a blue nylon bookmark glued into the spine.
sentences.chinese: 書脊處甚至粘着尼龍書籤繩。

sentences.english: Nylon Socks are packed in wooden cases, each containing 50 dozen.
sentences.chinese: 尼龍襪用木箱包裝，每箱裝50打。

sentences.english: The flysheet is made from proofed nylon.
sentences.chinese: 帳篷的門簾是用防水尼龍做的。

sentences.english: Interior organic cotton, exterior weather-resistant nylon fabric.
sentences.chinese: 內部是有機棉，外部是抵禦冰冷氣象的尼龍原料。

definition: to flow freely (of air)/to ventilate/to breathe (of fabric etc)/to take a breath of fresh air/to divulge
painted ornament/livery (on airline or company vehicle)
